mapper.select: select c.content_id, c.content_name , h.user_id_leader , to_char(h.homework_deadline, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as homework_deadline , h.homework_content_leader, h.homework_content_learner from homework h ,users u, content c where u.user_id = h.user_id_learner and u.user_id = #{user_id} and h.content_id = c.content_id order by h.homework_deadline asc
select content_name from users, homework, content where users.user_id = #{user_id} and #{user_id} = homework.user_id_learner and homework.content_id = content.content_id
select group_id from groups where group_id = #{group_id};
select count(*) from users left join homework on users.user_id = homework.user_id_learner where user_type = 2 and group_id is not null and user_id = #{user_id}
